channel.title: Skinny Bob
channel.description: A forensic analysis of allegedly leaked UFO and alien footage.

item.title: 3D reconstruction of flying twin aerial view
item.description: To aid location finding efforts, the landscape shown in the flying twin scenes has been reconstructed.

item.title: Origin of Blue Boys name found
item.description: The moniker Blue Boys refers to Project Blue Book staff and can be found in literature before 1971.

item.title: Initial publication
item.description: The website is skinnybob.info is online.
